assessmentQuestionVersion.name: FSC_FF_InvestmentPreference
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Which statement aligns with your perspective about selecting investments?
assessmentQuestionVersion.responseValues: I prefer to accept lower returns for lower risk. I prefer to diversify my portfolio with a focus on low-risk investments. I prefer to have a balanced portfolio. I prefer to diversify my accounts with a focus on higher-return assets and low-risk investments. I prefer to choose investments with known price fluctuations to achieve higher long-term returns.
